TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Style extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public Class Style Inherits Component Implements IStateManager
public ref class Style : System::ComponentModel::Component, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type Style = class inherit Component interface IStateManager

summary.span: 表示 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式。

span.span: Represents the style of a Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會封裝來控制 Web 伺服器控制項的外觀，並可以套用至多個 Web 伺服器控制項提供的通用外觀的屬性。The class encapsulates the properties that control the appearance of a Web server control and can be applied to multiple Web server controls to provide a common appearance. 您可以藉由設定指定的背景色彩和字型色彩控制項和屬性，分別。You can specify the background color and font color of a control by setting the and properties, respectively. 在控制項上可以顯示框線，控制項的框線寬度、 樣式、 框線樣式和的框線色彩設定， ，和屬性。On controls that can display a border, you can control the border width, the border style, and the border color by setting the , , and properties. Web 伺服器控制項的大小也可以指定使用和屬性。The size of a Web server control can also be specified by using the and properties. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用次變更多個控制項的樣式屬性的物件。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次的其中一個屬性值變更，則每個控制項必須呼叫其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 請注意，並非所有包含的控制項支援所示範的所有屬性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用次變更多個控制項的樣式屬性的物件。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次的其中一個屬性值變更，則每個控制項必須呼叫其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 請注意，並非所有包含的控制項支援所示範的所有屬性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). span.span: Adds HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered to the specified .

summary.span: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

span.span: This method is primarily used by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要轉譯屬性和用戶端上的 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式，您通常會呼叫和方法成插入每個屬性，並個別為樣式輸出資料流。To render attributes and styles for a Web server control on the client, you typically call the and methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the output stream. 若要簡化此程序，這個方法會封裝所有呼叫和方法的每個屬性和相關聯的 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式。To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the and methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web server control. 所有屬性和樣式會都插入到單一方法呼叫中的輸出資料流。All attributes and styles are inserted into the output stream in a single method call.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void AddAttributesToRender (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl owner);

summary.span: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

span.span: This method is primarily used by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要轉譯屬性和用戶端上的 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式，您通常會呼叫和方法成插入每個屬性，並個別為樣式輸出資料流。To render attributes and styles for a Web server control on the client, you typically call the and methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the output stream. 若要簡化此程序，這個方法會封裝所有呼叫和方法的每個屬性和相關聯的 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式。To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the and methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web Server control. 所有屬性和樣式會都插入到單一方法呼叫中的輸出資料流。All attributes and styles are inserted into the output stream in a single method call. 這個方法通常會覆寫由控制項開發人員在衍生類別中插入適當的屬性和樣式以輸出資料流類別。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立衍生自類別類別。The following example demonstrates how to create a class that derives from the class. 基底實作新增屬性適用於衍生類別中覆寫方法輸出資料流。The base implementation of the method is overridden to add attributes appropriate to the derived class in the output stream. summary.span: 取得或設定 Web 伺服器控制項的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the Web server control.

value.span: ，代表控制項的背景色彩。

span.span: A that represents the background color of the control.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的背景色彩。Use the property to specify the background color of the Web server control. 這個屬性會設定使用物件。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性會呈現只針對特定的控制項。This property will render only for certain controls. 例如， ， ， ， ，和會呈現此屬性。For example, , , , , and will render this property. 它也可用於，和如果其`RepeatLayout`屬性是`RepeatLayout.Table`，而非`RepeatLayout.Flow`。It will also work for , and if their `RepeatLayout` property is `RepeatLayout.Table`, and not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 一般情況下，只會控制轉譯為的``標記可以顯示的背景色彩在 HTML 3.2 中，而幾乎任何控制項可以在 HTML 4.0 中。In general, only controls that render as a `
` tag can display a background color in HTML 3.2, whereas almost any control can in HTML 4.0.控制項可呈現為``標記 (包括，則所有驗證控制項和清單控制項和其`RepeatLayout`屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Flow`)，這個屬性會在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 5 或更新版本，但不是Microsoft Internet explorer 第 4 版。For controls that render as a `` tag (including , all validation controls, and list controls with their `RepeatLayout` property set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`), this property will work in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 or later, but not for Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用次變更多個控制項的樣式屬性的物件。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次的其中一個屬性值變更，則每個控制項必須呼叫其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 請注意，並非所有包含的控制項支援所示範的所有屬性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的框線色彩。Use the property to specify the border color of the Web server control. 這個屬性會設定使用物件。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性會呈現只針對特定的控制項。This property will render only for certain controls. 例如， ， ， ， ，和會呈現此屬性。For example, , , , , and will render this property. 它也可用於， ，和如果其`RepeatLayout`屬性是`RepeatLayout.Table`而非`RepeatLayout.Flow`。It will also work for , , and if their `RepeatLayout` property is `RepeatLayout.Table` and not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 不過，它會轉譯為`bordercolor`屬性，可能不適用於所有瀏覽器。However, it is rendered as the `bordercolor` attribute, which may not work in all browsers. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用次變更多個控制項的樣式屬性的物件。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次的其中一個屬性值變更，則每個控制項必須呼叫其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 請注意，並非所有包含的控制項支援所示範的所有屬性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 取得或設定 Web 伺服器控制項的框線樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of the Web server control.

value.span: 其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的框線樣式。Use the property to specify the border style for the Web server control. 這個屬性會設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |框線樣式Border Style|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未設定的框線樣式。The border style is not set.| |`None`|沒有框線No border| |`Dotted`|點線框線。A dotted line border.| |`Dashed`|虛線框線。A dashed line border.| |`Solid`|實線框線。A solid line border.| |`Double`|雙實線框線。A solid double line border.| |`Groove`|凹陷框線外觀的溝槽框線。A grooved border for a sunken border appearance.| |`Ridge`|凸起框線外觀的脊狀框線。A ridged border for a raised border appearance.| |`Inset`|凹陷控制項外觀的嵌入框線。An inset border for a sunken control appearance.| |`Outset`|凸起控制項外觀的外圍框線。An outset border for a raised control appearance.| > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性將不會在某些瀏覽器上呈現。This property will not render on some browsers. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用次變更多個控制項的樣式屬性的物件。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次的其中一個屬性值變更，則每個控制項必須呼叫其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 請注意，並非所有包含的控制項支援所示範的所有屬性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性可指定控制項的框線寬度。Use the property to specify a border width for a control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不適用於所有的 Web 伺服器控制項。This property does not work with all Web server controls. 它只會套用至控制項顯示為資料表，例如和。It only applies to controls that display as a table, such as and . 此屬性設為物件。This property is set with a object. 如果屬性包含負數時，會擲回例外狀況。If the property of the contains a negative number, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 框線寬度只能表示早於 Microsoft Internet Explorer 第 5 版的瀏覽器的像素為單位。The border width can only be expressed in pixels for browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5. 在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 和更新版本中支援所有的單位類型。All unit types are supported in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 and later. 請參閱特定的控制項，如需詳細資訊。Refer to the specific control for details. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用次變更多個控制項的樣式屬性的物件。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次的其中一個屬性值變更，則每個控制項必須呼叫其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 請注意，並非所有包含的控制項支援所示範的所有屬性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 將指定的 的樣式屬性複製到呼叫這個方法的 類別的執行個體中。

span.span: Duplicates the style properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用複製指定的樣式屬性的方法轉換的執行個體從呼叫這個方法的類別。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from. 使用註冊樣式時，然後再複製使用，則只屬性複製到目的地，並非所有的個別內容。When a style is registered using , and then copied using , only the property is copied to the destination, not all the individual properties. 如果您再複製或檢查的目的樣式屬性，這可能導致非預期的結果。This could lead to unexpected results if you then copy or examine the properties of the destination style. 例如，如果您使用複製從字型資訊屬性已註冊的是，您不會收到個別設定的字型樣式。For example, if you are using to copy font information from the property of a that is registered, you will not get the individual settings of the font from the style. > [!CAUTION] > 所有屬性，包括已設定在目前的執行個體類別，在相關聯的屬性會取代所指定`s`參數。All properties, including those that have been set in the current instance of the class, will be replaced by the associated property in the specified by the `s` parameter.

span.span: has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要在 Web 伺服器控制項的用戶端上呈現之 CSS 類別。Use the property to specify the CSS class to render on the client for the Web server control. 這個屬性會呈現的所有控制項的瀏覽器。This property will render on browsers for all controls. 永遠會轉譯為`class`屬性，不論瀏覽器。It will always be rendered as the `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. 例如，假設您有下列的 Web 伺服器控制項宣告：For example, suppose you have the following Web server control declaration: ``` ``` 下列 HTML 轉譯先前的 Web 伺服器控制項宣告用戶端上：The following HTML is rendered on the client for the previous Web server control declaration: ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 在瀏覽器不支援 CSS，設定屬性會有任何作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property will have no effect.

summary.span: 取得與 Web 伺服器控制項關聯的字型屬性。

value.span: ，表示 Web 伺服器控制項的字型屬性。

span.span: A that represents the font properties of the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的 Web 伺服器控制項的字型屬性。Use the property to specify the font properties of the Web server control. 這個屬性包含可存取子屬性宣告的形式`Property-Subproperty`(例如`Font-Bold`) 或以程式設計方式在表單的`Property.Subproperty`(例如`Font.Bold`)。This property includes subproperties that can be accessed declaratively in the form of `Property-Subproperty` (for example `Font-Bold`) or programmatically in the form of `Property.Subproperty` (for example `Font.Bold`). 所有的子屬性會呈現在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 的所有控制項的第 4 版之前的瀏覽器中。All but one subproperty will render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls. 它們是： ， ， ， ， ， ，和(但是只有名為字型大小，例如`Small`， `Smaller`，依此類推，運作)。They are: , , , , , , and (but only named font sizes, such as `Small`, `Smaller`, and so on, will work). > [!NOTE] > 雖然這些子屬性會呈現在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 第 4 版之前的瀏覽器中，HTML 轉譯是與更新版本的瀏覽器中不同。Although these subproperties render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4, the HTML that is rendered is different than in later browsers. 而不是轉譯為樣式屬性，這些子屬性會轉譯為 HTML 項目，例如``和``。Instead of rendering as style attributes, these subproperties are rendered as HTML elements, such as `` and ``. 將不會在某些瀏覽器呈現的一個子屬性是。One subproperty that will not render on some browsers is . ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用次變更多個控制項的樣式屬性的物件。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次的其中一個屬性值變更，則每個控制項必須呼叫其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 請注意，並非所有包含的控制項支援所示範的所有屬性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的前景色彩。Use the property to specify the foreground color of the Web server control. 前景色彩通常是文字的色彩。The foreground color is usually the color of the text. 這個屬性會呈現在瀏覽器上早於 Microsoft Internet Explorer 第 4 版的所有控制項，除了， ，和。This property will render on browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls, except the , , and . > [!NOTE] > 在瀏覽器不支援樣式，這個屬性會呈現為 FONT 元素。On browsers that do not support styles, this property is rendered as a FONT element. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用次變更多個控制項的樣式屬性的物件。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次的其中一個屬性值變更，則每個控制項必須呼叫其方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 請注意，並非所有包含的控制項支援所示範的所有屬性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控制項不支援特定的屬性，屬性值變更時，將不會變更控制項的外觀。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 在控制項上標記追蹤狀態變更的開頭。

span.span: Any changes made after tracking has begun will be tracked and saved as part of the control view state.
